WorkItem.Description: As I've finally gotten around to make a rogue, I though I'd try making a gear list with rawr for him - but looks like it's treating my rogue as a druid - listing items and especially weapons that is druid oriented - unless ofcause rogues suddenly can use staves and 2handers:) I've just tried downloading rawr again, to see if I'd messed something up with the setups ( haven't tickered with them but you never know:P )... Any suggestions to fix it?

Comments.Message: When you created your character in Rawr you did change the class drop down didn't you?? If you leave it at Druid then its going to model your character as a Druid.
There isn't a Rawr model for Rogues.
i imported my char from the armory and it's set on rogue.. works fine with my retri paladin...
ah - no model for rogues.... that explains:) missed that on the starting:)
